nodes.title: Hybrid Sigma Scheduler
nodes.description:
Advanced sigma scheduler generator with multiple algorithms, presets,
visualization, and the new Bong Tangent scheduler.

nodes.title: MD: ACE Latent Visualizer
nodes.description:
MD: ACE Latent Visualizer

Provides multiple visualization modes (waveform, spectrum, heatmap, etc.)
for inspecting latent tensors, aiding in debugging and analysis. Includes
options for batch/channel selection, normalization, peak detection, and styling.

nodes.title: MD: ACE T5 Conditioning Analyzer
nodes.description:
MD: ACE T5 Conditioning Analyzer

Debugging tool to inspect conditioning tensor statistics, lyrics token count,
and metadata. Helps diagnose quality issues related to conditioning.

nodes.title: MD: ACE T5 Conditioning Scheduled
nodes.description:
MD: ACE T5 Conditioning Scheduled

Creates high-quality audio conditioning using ACE T5, separating genre/style tags,
vocal characteristics, and lyrical content. Supports both the custom AceT5ModelLoader
(recommended for quality) and native ComfyUI CLIP loaders (for LoRA support).
Outputs multiple conditioning tensors for different use cases.

nodes.title: MD: ACE T5 Model Loader
nodes.description:
MD: ACE T5 Model Loader

Loads the custom ACE T5 model and its specialized tokenizers.
Provides the highest quality conditioning for ACE Step audio models.
NOTE: This custom loader does *not* support LoRAs. Use the native
CLIPLoader/DualCLIPLoader for LoRA compatibility (may have slightly
different conditioning characteristics).

nodes.title: MD: APG Guider
nodes.description: ComfyUI node for APG (Adaptive Projected Gradient) guidance.

nodes.title: MD: Advanced Audio Preview & Save
nodes.description:
Professional audio processing and export node for ComfyUI.
Handles normalization, effects, visualization, and intelligent metadata embedding.

nodes.title: MD: Advanced Media Save
nodes.description:
Saves images or animations in various formats with metadata control.
Uses timestamped filenames inspired by AAPS to prevent overwrites.

nodes.title: MD: Advanced Text Input
nodes.description:
A versatile text input node with seed-controlled wildcard processing,
text transformations, and multiple output options including text length.

nodes.title: MD: Aesthetic Transformer
nodes.description:
MD: Aesthetic Transformer (v1.7.0)
Transforms simple user intent and/or images into complex, high-quality prompts.

nodes.title: MD: Apply TPG (Token Perturbation)
nodes.description: Applies Token Perturbation Guidance (TPG) by patching the model's Self-Attention.

nodes.title: MD: Audio Auto EQ
nodes.description:
Audio Auto EQ (MD_AudioAutoEQ)
Applies automatic equalization to audio by analyzing its spectrum
and matching it to a selected target profile using multi-band EQ.

nodes.title: MD: Audio Auto Master Pro
nodes.description:
Audio Auto Master Pro (MD_AutoMasterNode)
An all-in-one, iterative audio mastering node.

nodes.title: MD: Auto-Layout Optimizer
nodes.description:
MD: Auto-Layout Optimizer (Prototype)

Analyzes the layout structure of a ComfyUI workflow provided as JSON.
Calculates metrics (complexity, spacing, crossings), generates optimization
recommendations, and optionally applies a selected auto-layout algorithm,
outputting the modified workflow JSON.

nodes.title: MD: CLIP Token Finder
nodes.description: Universal token finder for Self-Cross Guidance.

nodes.title: MD: Custom Noise Generator
nodes.description:
Creates a standalone NOISE object for SamplerCustomAdvanced using
selectable algorithms (Gaussian, Perlin, Collatz, etc.).

nodes.title: MD: Empty Latent Ratio Select
nodes.description:
Generates empty latents based on Aspect Ratio and Target Megapixels.
Calculates precise W/H dimensions to match total pixel count area.

nodes.title: MD: Enhanced Annotation
nodes.description:
MD: Enhanced Annotation

A highly customizable node for adding visual documentation (notes, headers,
reminders) directly into the ComfyUI workflow graph. Supports various styles,
colors, fonts, and markdown. It does not perform any computations and acts
purely as a visual aid, with no impact on generation performance.

nodes.title: MD: Enhanced Seed Saver
nodes.description:
MD Enhanced Seed Saver

Advanced seed management node with three operation modes: Pass-through for
external seeds, Manual Input for direct seed entry, and Execute Action for
dynamic seed management operations.

nodes.title: MD: Filename Counter
nodes.description:
MD: Filename Counter
Provides a persistent, auto-incrementing counter stored in a JSON file.

nodes.title: MD: Filename Token Replacer
nodes.description:
MD: Filename Token Replacer
Replaces predefined tokens in a template string.

nodes.title: MD: GPU Temp Protect (Enhanced)
nodes.description:
MD: GPU Temperature Protection (Enhanced)

Monitors GPU temperature, VRAM, and utilization via nvidia-smi.
Pauses the ComfyUI queue if temperature exceeds a set threshold, resuming
once it cools down. Includes multi-GPU support, logging, adaptive cooling,
and specific data type pass-through. Outputs the current temperature as a string.

nodes.title: MD: Global Update Fixer (v1.7.1)
nodes.description: Manages custom nodes. Includes Repair Tool for converting manual installs to Git repos.

nodes.title: MD: Init Noise Optimizer
nodes.description: Pre-sampling noise optimization node.

nodes.title: MD: LLM VRAM Manager
nodes.description:
MD: LLM VRAM Manager

Utility node to manage VRAM conflicts with local LLM servers (Ollama, LM Studio, llama-swap).
Provides actions to unload models via API (Ollama, llama-swap) or force-stop processes
to free GPU memory during ComfyUI workflow execution. Includes pass-through
connections for easy integration.

nodes.title: MD: Mastering Chain (Full)
nodes.description:
Advanced ComfyUI audio mastering chain node (All-in-One).
Uses the same logic as modular nodes via MasteringBase.

nodes.title: MD: Mastering Compressor
nodes.description: Standalone Compressor Node

nodes.title: MD: Mastering EQ & Filters
nodes.description: Standalone EQ/Filter Node

nodes.title: MD: Mastering Gain
nodes.description: Standalone Gain Node

nodes.title: MD: Mastering Limiter
nodes.description: Standalone Limiter Node

nodes.title: MD: Noise Blender (5-Layer)
nodes.description:
Combines up to 5 Noise sources sequentially into a single NOISE object.
Inspired by Bleppings Sonar suite.

nodes.title: MD: Noise Decay Scheduler (Advanced)
nodes.description:
MD: Noise Decay Scheduler (Advanced)

Generates a customizable noise decay curve object based on various algorithms
(polynomial, sigmoidal, etc.) for use with compatible custom samplers.

nodes.title: MD: Optimizer Selector
nodes.description: Configures an Optimizer Factory for use in advanced sampling or training nodes.

nodes.title: MD: PingPong Sampler (FBG v1.5.0)
nodes.description: ComfyUI Node wrapper with Res 2 restart support (v1.5.0).

nodes.title: MD: Qwen Object Replacer
nodes.description:
MD: Qwen Object Replacer (v1.7.1)
VLM-enhanced inpainting pre-processor optimized for Qwen-Image-Edit models.

nodes.title: MD: Repo Fortress (v2.2.1)
nodes.description: Manages updates for MD_Nodes. Includes Fortress safeguards (Disk Space, Race Conditions).

nodes.title: MD: Sampler Debug
nodes.description: Shows if guider is being called.

nodes.title: MD: Scene Genius Autocreator
nodes.description:
A multi-stage ComfyUI node leveraging local LLMs for dynamic creative content
generation (genres, lyrics, duration) and technical configuration (YAMLs).

nodes.title: MD: Self-Cross Separation Guider
nodes.description: ComfyUI node for Self-Cross subject separation guidance.

nodes.title: MD: Smart Color Palette Manager
nodes.description:
MD: Smart Color Palette Manager (Prototype)

Manages and provides color palettes for workflow organization. Select presets,
use auto-detection based on keywords, or define custom colors. Outputs
individual hex codes and a visual preview image. Complements other
Workflow Organization Suite nodes.

nodes.title: MD: Smart Filename Builder
nodes.description:
MD: Smart Filename Builder
Generates complex and clean filenames using presets or custom configurations.

nodes.title: MD: Text File Loader
nodes.description: Companion node to load text content from external files.

nodes.title: MD: Universal Context Bus
nodes.description:
Universal Context Bus.
Aggregates inputs into a dictionary and outputs them individually.

nodes.title: MD: Universal Guardian
nodes.description:
MD Universal Guardian

Evaluates generated outputs (latent, image) against quality metrics.
Optionally retries generation with enhanced prompts if quality is below threshold,
using Ollama, LM Studio, or keywords.

nodes.title: MD: Universal Routing Hub
nodes.description:
MD: Universal Routing Hub (Advanced)

An advanced signal routing node using the universal '*' type. It passes data
from input slots to corresponding output slots. Optionally monitors connected
slots, detects data types, generates a visual status map, and provides
textual metrics. Supports chaining hubs via status strings.

nodes.title: MD: VLM Confirmation Gate
nodes.description:
MD: VLM Confirmation Gate
Validates a generated image against the original user intent using a local VLM.

nodes.title: MD: Wildcard Prompt Builder
nodes.description: The ultimate multi-mode prompt generation node.

nodes.title: MD: Workflow Section Organizer
nodes.description:
MD: Workflow Section Organizer (Prototype)

A universal passthrough node (*) designed to act as a visual separator or
'chapter marker' within complex ComfyUI workflows. It accepts any data type,
passes it through completely unchanged, and displays as a customizable banner.
Helps to visually structure large graphs into logical processing stages.

nodes.title: PingPong Sampler (Lite+ v1.5.0)
nodes.description: ComfyUI node wrapper for the Lite+ PingPongSampler.

nodes.title: Sigma Concatenate
nodes.description:
Concatenates two sigma schedules for multi-pass workflows.
Useful for chaining different schedulers or creating custom multi-stage schedules.

nodes.title: Sigma Smooth
nodes.description:
Applies smoothing to a sigma schedule to reduce harsh transitions.
Useful for reducing artifacts caused by abrupt sigma changes.
